articles.title: Russia announces new military withdrawal from annexed Crimea - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Reacting to the Ukraine developments and mixed earnings news, Europe's top stock markets mostly rose at the start of trading Thursday
articles.content:
Russia announced a new drawdown of military forces from the Moscow-annexed Crimean peninsula on Thursday, continuing a troop withdrawal that was met with scepticism from Ukraine's western allies.

articles.title: Southern African leaders arrive in Brussels for EU-AU Summit with high hopes - News24
articles.description: Southern African heads of state and their representatives have started arriving in Brussels, Belgium, for the 6th European Union-African Union Summit with high hopes for their respective countries.
